description: Collects browsing artifacts from Google Chrome, Chromium, Microsoft Edge, and Firefox (native, Flatpak, and Snap). Extracts history, bookmarks, downloads, and cookies from detected profiles within a specified lookback window (in hours). Outputs NDJSON structured per user, profile, and browser for forensic and threat-hunting purposes. Writes results atomically to the Active Response log with .new fallback.

script_parameters.name: LOOKBACK_HOURS
script_parameters.description: Number of hours to look back when collecting browser artifacts. Default: 168 (7 days).
